documents.text: Luxon is a powerful, modern library for working with dates and times in JavaScript, built by one of the Moment.js maintainers.
Moment.js is a legacy date-time library for JavaScript, now in maintenance mode.
date-fns provides the most comprehensive, yet simple and consistent toolset for manipulating JavaScript dates in a functional way.
Day.js is a minimalist JavaScript library that parses, validates, manipulates, and displays dates and times with a modern API.
Lodash is a modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance & extras.

query: how to create docker multistage build

documents.text: Use multi-stage builds in Docker to reduce image size: start from a builder image, compile artifacts, and copy only the necessary files into a slim runtime image.
Leverage Docker layer caching with proper ordering of COPY and RUN commands for faster builds.
Docker Compose is used to define and run multi-container Docker applications.
Kubernetes is a system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
pgvector is a PostgreSQL extension for vector similarity search, enabling storage of embeddings and ANN queries in Postgres.
PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system.
Weaviate is an open source vector database built for the AI era.
RediSearch is a fast text search engine on top of Redis.
